## 1.2.0

* Increase minimum required PHP version to 7.4.

## 1.1.0

* Deprecate usage of `PhysicalQuantity::substract`, use `PhysicalQuantity::subtract` instead.
* Add `PhysicalQuantity::subtract`.


## 1.0.1

* Add method `PhysicalQuantity::prettyPrint`.
* Add class `Time`.


## 1.0.0

* Initial release
